DataElement.preferredName: Ancillary Study HBV Genotype Assay Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A textual description of an assay used to determine which hepatitis B virus genome(s) is present in an infection. Seven genotypes of HBV (designated A through G) have been identified. Different genotypes are prevalent in different geographical areas and each carries a different risk of development of hepatocellular carcinoma.
